CustomField.description: When the selected Product is included on a Quote, this relationship rule will be checked and the Message will be displayed if the Related Product is in violation of either the include/exclude or the one/many settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the selected Product is included on a Quote, this relationship rule will be checked and the Message will be displayed if the Related Product is in violation of either the include/exclude or the one/many settings.
CustomField.label: Current ZProduct
